item.title: LD Capital Founder Jihan Yi: The best strategy in a bull market is to HODL and buy the dip
item.description: On August 7th, Richard Li Hua, the founder of LD Capital, posted on social media, expressing that Trump is more keen on seeing a rate cut and a rise in the crypto market than investors (a significant portion of his family's assets are in the crypto market). item.title: BiyaPay Analyst: Caocao Mobility's Hong Kong Stock Soars Over 20%, Transitioning from Ride-Hailing to On-Chain Assets, Caocao Mobility's Real World Asset On-Chain Activation Ignites Robotaxi New Ec...
item.description: On August 7th, Caocao Mobility (Hong Kong Stock Code 02643) officially entered into a memorandum of understanding on virtual asset strategic cooperation with the Hong Kong-licensed institution Victory Securities. The cooperation focuses on three main aspects: the securitization of real-world assets (RWA), stablecoin payments, and compliant digital currency issuance. In response to this news, Caocao Mobility's Hong Kong stock price surged by more than 20% on August 7th, with the RWA concept becoming the focus of the market.This cooperation marks the first systematic exploration in the ride-hailing industry of the "ride-hailing asset + RWA" application scenario. Caocao Mobility CEO Gong Xin stated that through RWA technology, green mobility will be deeply integrated with digital finance, which may revitalize core assets such as Robotaxi and help the company establish a first-mover advantage in the autonomous driving field. item.title: INFINIT is launching the IN token along with staking functionality, ushering in an AI-powered Agentic DeFi economy.
item.description: On August 7th, INFINIT announced that the core token IN of the platform was officially launched, and simultaneously opened the staking function. The aim is to build a growth flywheel centered around real utility. IN will serve as the engine of the Agentic DeFi economy and build long-term value around three core functions: protocol fee sharing, governance participation, and platform priority access.Users can now execute complex strategies with one click. By staking IN, they can earn rewards and support top strategy creators, which helps to form an intelligence-driven DeFi growth loop.Qualified users can claim tokens from August 7th at 10:00 UTC to September 6th at 10:00 UTC, including:- INFINIT Stones holders (Epoch 1-5)- Kaito Yappers- Community contributors- Ecosystem partners.
